statements: SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, dish_name, country FROM recipes WHERE country = 'Mexico';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE country = 'France' ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE country = 'Japan' ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT dish_name, country FROM recipes WHERE country='Italy'
SELECT recipe_id, dish_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE dish_name LIKE '%Pasta%'
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id IN (3, 5, 7)
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM recipes ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT * FROM recipes_table
SELECT dish_name, country FROM recipes_table WHERE country='Italy'
SELECT recipe_id, dish_name, ingredients FROM recipes_table ORDER BY recipe_id DESC
SELECT country_name FROM countries_table WHERE country_name='France'
SELECT * FROM recipes_table WHERE country='Japan'
SELECT * FROM recipes_table WHERE country='Italy';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients FROM recipes_table ORDER BY dish_name ASC;
SELECT country_name FROM countries_table WHERE country_id=5;
SELECT dish_name, instructions FROM recipes_table WHERE country='Mexico' ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM recipes_table ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE country='Italy';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM countries ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%tomato%';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email='example@example.com';
SELECT dish_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE country='Italy';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE id=1;
SELECT dish_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE country='Japan' ORDER BY dish_name ASC;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS recipe_count FROM recipes GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT u.username, r.dish_name FROM users u INNER JOIN recipes r ON u.id = r.id WHERE u.username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM tbl_recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, country FROM tbl_recipes WHERE country='Italy';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM tbl_recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM tbl_recipes;
SELECT * FROM tbl_ingredients WHERE category='Meat';
SELECT * FROM tbl_recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM tbl_recipes WHERE country='Italy';
SELECT * FROM tbl_dishes JOIN tbl_recipes ON tbl_dishes.recipe_id = tbl_recipes.recipe_id;
SELECT dish_name, country_name FROM tbl_dishes JOIN tbl_countries ON tbl_dishes.country_id = tbl_countries.country_id;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name FROM tbl_recipes JOIN tbl_dishes ON tbl_recipes.recipe_id = tbl_dishes.recipe_id JOIN tbl_ingredients ON tbl_dishes.dish_id = tbl_ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, country FROM Recipe WHERE country ='Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, description FROM Recipe ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT country_name FROM Country WHERE country_id = 1;

SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM RecipeIngredient INNER JOIN Recipe ON Recipe.recipe_id = RecipeIngredient.recipe_id INNER JOIN Ingredient ON Ingredient.ingredient_id = RecipeIngredient.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_name, description FROM Recipe WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE ingredient_name LIKE '%tomato%';
SELECT country_name, COUNT(recipe_id) AS recipe_count FROM Recipe INNER JOIN Country ON Recipe.country = Country.country_name GROUP BY country_name;

SELECT Recipe.recipe_name, Ingredient.ingredient_name, RecipeIngredient.quantity FROM Recipe INNER JOIN RecipeIngredient ON Recipe.recipe_id = RecipeIngredient.recipe_id INNER JOIN Ingredient ON RecipeIngredient.ingredient_id = Ingredient.ingredient_id;
SELECT Recipe.recipe_name, Step.step_description FROM Recipe LEFT JOIN Step ON Recipe.recipe_id = Step.recipe_id;
